AllRecipes.Name: BLT Unwrap & Roll®
AllRecipes.Description: Tomato slices, spring greens, and cooked bacon are layered on a sheet of fresh mozzarella. Roll it up and slice it, and you've got BLT pinwheels!
AllRecipes.Author: BelGioioso

AllRecipes.Name: Take The Night Off Slow Cooker Pineapple Chicken
AllRecipes.Description: Served with brown rice and steamed broccoli, it makes a nice Asian-style meal. It's a nice, mild dish.
AllRecipes.Author: Judy Turner Mahoney

AllRecipes.Name: Devil's Meatloaf on the Grill
AllRecipes.Description: This spicy meatloaf was born from a collection of leftovers in my fridge that I combined into this yummy loaf.
AllRecipes.Author: Heatheross

AllRecipes.Name: Red Broccoli Salad
AllRecipes.Description: This a hearty meat and vegetable salad: two pounds of maple flavored bacon make it very filling.  It's a meal in itself!
AllRecipes.Author: MAGGIE MCGUIRE

AllRecipes.Name: Best Peanut Butter Cookies Ever
AllRecipes.Description: This is an amazing no-flour peanut butter cookie. It is so easy, even kids like to make it.
AllRecipes.Author: BAKINGNUTS

AllRecipes.Name: Ham and Broccoli Bake
AllRecipes.Description: This quick, week-night dinner is a nice alternative to mac and cheese with ham.  It comes together easily and is comforting and filling.
AllRecipes.Author: mrs.embee

AllRecipes.Name: Super-Easy Sausage and Peppers
AllRecipes.Description: A simple and delicious way to serve sausage and peppers with a tomato-based sauce. This is one of my husband's and kids' favorite meals. They like it served over rice because it makes a lot of 'gravy' that soaks into the rice. It 's one of my favorites because it's quick, easy, and has only a few ingredients that I usually have on hand.
AllRecipes.Author: Michele Novellano League

AllRecipes.Name: Goldenrod Egg
AllRecipes.Description: This recipe is a generational French family tradition for Easter morning. I have searched the entire internet and I've never heard of anyone having it but our family. Everyone likes it so much that we have it more often than just Easter. It's a food that grows on you!
AllRecipes.Author: danaferre

AllRecipes.Name: Strawberry Mojito
AllRecipes.Description: I had this drink at a popular chain restaurant and decided to try it at home.  I have served it at a couple different gatherings now and it has always been given rave reviews. It's the perfect drink for a hot summer day!
AllRecipes.Author: Jolene

AllRecipes.Name: Chef John's Hot Cross Buns
AllRecipes.Description: Real hot cross buns have the cross baked into them, not piped on afterwards. These are studded with rum-soaked currants. I based my recipe on one I found on Anson Mills' web site.
AllRecipes.Author: Chef John

AllRecipes.Name: Light Cranberry-Coconut Refresher
AllRecipes.Description: A refreshing thirst quencher that's not loaded with calories and sugar and has just the right balance of sweet-tart. This is the perfect beverage for anybody watching their calories but still looking for full flavor.
AllRecipes.Author: lutzflcat

AllRecipes.Name: Inside-Out Spicy Tuna and Avocado Sushi
AllRecipes.Description: Super easy and super delicious! Once you master the art of rolling, I guarantee you will never want to go out and pay top dollar for your sushi fix again! Depending on how big you roll your sushi, you may need more or less sushi rice. Serve with soy sauce and wasabi paste.
AllRecipes.Author: yellowpairs ♥

AllRecipes.Name: Cashew Gravy
AllRecipes.Description: The other breakfast/lunch/dinner gravy. My favorite gravy.
AllRecipes.Author: Pastorjackf

AllRecipes.Name: Hummus Noodle Salad
AllRecipes.Description: This noodle salad can be served cold, as it was originally intended, or hot. I prefer it hot. This is a vegetarian recipe, but even for meat eaters it is beautiful. It is very versatile; you can easily adjust it to your preferences, adding complementary flavors and ingredients. It is also wonderful as is.
AllRecipes.Author: Dora Bingeman

AllRecipes.Name: Champinones a la Sevillana (Seville-Style Mushrooms)
AllRecipes.Description: Sliced mushrooms and Parma ham cooked in a mix of olive oil and garlic.
AllRecipes.Author: Joseph

AllRecipes.Name: Gluten-Free Fried Cheese Curds
AllRecipes.Description: Crispy, crunchy gluten-free goodness! Serve with ranch or marinara for dipping. Yum!
AllRecipes.Author: tamramontroy

AllRecipes.Name: Kristen's Baked Oatmeal
AllRecipes.Description: This is a wonderful breakfast or brunch recipe for 8 to 10 people.  Even if you aren't an oatmeal fan, adding fruit and nuts to this yummy baked delight will change your mind. Top with chopped nuts, flaxseed meal, yogurt, warmed almond milk, or the toppings of your choice.
AllRecipes.Author: emme

AllRecipes.Name: Big Batch Creamy Gravy for a Crowd
AllRecipes.Description: This meatless gravy gets a kick from a whole lot of freshly ground black pepper. It's perfect for using in a fountain. Serve with biscuits and browned sausage.
AllRecipes.Author: Leslie Kelly

AllRecipes.Name: Nothing I'd Rather Eat Quinoa Patties
AllRecipes.Description: What a treat! You will never miss hamburger meat again. This is real food that you can feel good about and that tastes so delicious and in addition is packed with the healthiest ingredients. These burgers do not need a bun so you will save some calories there.  I made this in my quest to satisfy my Chase and her difficult palate and it is a winner. Keep the batter ready to go in your refrigerator.
AllRecipes.Author: JKW

AllRecipes.Name: French Onion Dip Mozzarella Sticks
AllRecipes.Description: Serve warm, with or without your favorite marinara sauce.
AllRecipes.Author: Julie Hubert

AllRecipes.Name: Fluffy Whole Wheat Pancakes
AllRecipes.Description: These are the best pancakes I've had in my life. They are super fluffy and you can't tell that they are whole wheat.
AllRecipes.Author: eli1665

AllRecipes.Name: Eggplant Sushi Rolls
AllRecipes.Description: Oven-baked eggplant is rolled in nori sheets with medium-grain rice and avocado. Serve with soy sauce for dipping.
AllRecipes.Author: blabla19

AllRecipes.Name: Crunchy Shrimp Fajitas
AllRecipes.Description: This is a fun and tasty, easy-to-make recipe. Mexican fajita shrimp are served with a surprisingly crunchy tostada base! Timing is important with this recipe. You want your fajita mixture to sizzle when you serve, so make sure to prepare all your fixings (lettuce, tomatoes, cilantro, and jalapeno peppers) before you cook the shrimp. Arrange fixings on a serving tray with shredded cheese and sour cream.
AllRecipes.Author: Ashelena

AllRecipes.Name: Capicola, Shiitake, and Giardiniera Pizza with Smoked Gouda and Manchego
AllRecipes.Description: Try it... you'll like it!
AllRecipes.Author: cosgrove911

AllRecipes.Name: Breakfast Sausage Corn Dogs with Spiced Maple Syrup Dip
AllRecipes.Description: Homemade corn dogs made with breakfast sausage are served with a spiced maple syrup dip in this fair food treat everyone loves.
AllRecipes.Author: Julie Hubert

AllRecipes.Name: Chicken Bacon Ranch Loaded Bloomin' Onion
AllRecipes.Description: A homemade fried blooming onion is loaded with Cheddar cheese, bacon, and chicken in this crowd-pleasing appetizer served with ranch dressing.
AllRecipes.Author: Julie Hubert

AllRecipes.Name: Ragout de Pattes de Cochon (Pork Shank and Meatball Stew)
AllRecipes.Description: Rich stew from a French recipe.
AllRecipes.Author: Paloma

AllRecipes.Name: Cheese-Filled Easter Polish Bread (Babka)
AllRecipes.Description: This is a delicious sweet bread with a swirl of orange and vanilla-flavored cheese. It is easy to make and too easy to eat. We will enjoy it this Easter and I hope you enjoy it too! Eat one loaf for Easter and freeze the other for later.
AllRecipes.Author: Ellen Bancroft Ziegler

AllRecipes.Name: Oven Baked Supreme Pizza Tacos
AllRecipes.Description: Italian sausage, pizza sauce, pepperoni, olives, and mozzarella cheese are layered in taco shells in these family-friendly pizza tacos.
AllRecipes.Author: Julie Hubert

Delish.Name: Pizza Stuffed Zucchini
Delish.Description: Bonus: it's gluten free!
Delish.Author: Rian Handler

Delish.Name: Sticky Orange Chicken
Delish.Description: Takeout without even leaving the house!
Delish.Author: Rian Handler

Delish.Name: Linguine with Clams
Delish.Description: Get ready to feel like you're out to eat somewhere super fancy.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Confetti Cookie Dough Ball
Delish.Description: This is the only ball you need to see drop on New Year's Eve.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Garlic Parmesan Salmon
Delish.Description: Smothered in parsley and Parm, you need this herb-crusted salmon.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Melted Snowman Cookies
Delish.Description: *Guaranteed to melt your heart*
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Crab Mac & Cheese
Delish.Description: THIS is the fancy mac worthy of your holiday table.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Parmesan Shrimp Pasta
Delish.Description: Shrimp, spinach, tomatoes, garlic? Yes, this is the pasta of your dreams.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Reese's Peanut Butter Ball
Delish.Description: PB lovers, listen up!
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Honey Garlic Chicken
Delish.Description: A skillet chicken dinner so easy you'll be impressed with yourself.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Pumpkin Butterscotch Muffins
Delish.Description: Nothing goes together better than pumpkin and butterscotch—trust us.
Delish.Author: Joanna Saltz

Delish.Name: Sun-Dried Tomato Alfredo
Delish.Description: Alfredo lovers, you need to try this chicken angel hair version.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Mongolian Beef & Broccoli
Delish.Description: The sauce in this Mongolian beef is fire.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Spaghetti Frittata
Delish.Description: This is the most genius way to use up leftover pasta.
Delish.Author: Lauren Miyashiro

Delish.Name: Balsamic Glazed Chicken
Delish.Description: This sweet, tangy chicken is the perfect weeknight dinner.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: 'Steel Magnolias'-Inspired Cuppa Cuppa Cuppa Cake
Delish.Description: Dolly Parton would approve.

Delish.Name: Slutty Cheesecake Bars
Delish.Description: These will definitely get around.

Delish.Name: Buffalo Chicken Casserole
Delish.Description: Low carb, high rewards.

Delish.Name: Shrimp Drunken Noodles
Delish.Description: We're drunk in love.

Delish.Name: Breakfast Nachos
Delish.Description: Get in my belly.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Donut Fries
Delish.Description: Donut even think about touching my fries.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: French Onion Penne
Delish.Description: The perfect hybrid of pasta and the classic soup.

Delish.Name: Chili Cheese Burgers
Delish.Description: These are saucy and SO cheesy.

Delish.Name: Bacon Cheeseburger Pie

Delish.Name: Cookie Pops
Delish.Description: They're a milk dunking game-changer.

Delish.Name: Italian Sausage Stuffed Zucchini
Delish.Description: Zucchini boats stuffed with sausage and breadcrumbs is the bomb low-carb dinner.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Lasagna Stuffed Zucchini
Delish.Description: Lightening up lasagna with zucchini is one of our fave low-carb dinner hacks.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Garlic-Lemon Salmon
Delish.Description: Fall in love with the ultimate summer catch.

Delish.Name: 'Clueless'-Inspired Cookie Dough Log
Delish.Description: Here's what would've happened if Cher hadn't burned the cookie dough. (Spoiler: It's delish.)
Delish.Author: Candace Braun Davison

Delish.Name: Pretzel Fluffernutters
Delish.Description: Peanut butter, marshmallow, and pretzels are the perfect indoor s'mores.

Delish.Name: Nutella Pops
Delish.Description: Move over, fudgsicles! These homemade popsicles are just as easy as they are insanely delicious.

Delish.Name: Rolo-Stuffed Ritz
Delish.Description: Crunchy Ritz + melty Rolos are a sweet-salty match made in snack heaven!

Delish.Name: Three-Ingredient Spaghetti
Delish.Description: This simple pasta is a tangy, cheesy flavor bomb.

Delish.Name: Nutella Cool Whip Pie
Delish.Description: This cool, creamy pie is a Nutella lover's dream.
Delish.Author: Rian Handler

Delish.Name: Cinnabun Cake
Delish.Description: Whether you eat this for breakfast or dessert, cinnamon roll cake is a must.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Zucchini Brownies
Delish.Description: The sweetest way to get your veggie fix.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Whoopie Cake
Delish.Description: Giant whoopie cake > whoopie pie.
Delish.Author: Lauren Miyashiro

Delish.Name: Muffin Tin Cherry Pies
Delish.Description: Who needs a regular cherry pie when you can have a MINI one?!
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Frozen Cheesecake on a Stick
Delish.Description: This hack for store-bought cheesecake is genius.

Delish.Name: Penne Puttanesca
Delish.Description: Welcome to flavor town.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Tex-Mex Chicken Pizza
Delish.Description: This pizza's got an addicting southwestern kick.
Delish.Author: Lauren Miyashiro

Delish.Name: Snickerdoodle Crisp
Delish.Description: Sweet fruit + cookie topping = #summerdessertgoals.

Delish.Name: Stuffed Onion Soup Burgers
Delish.Description: Gruyère or go home.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Lemon Butter Chicken Pasta
Delish.Description: Meet your new favorite pasta combo.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Freedom Bark
Delish.Description: This stunning red, white, and blue bark tastes like freedom.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Breakfast Fried Rice
Delish.Description: Rice for breakfast will become your new favorite way to start the day.
Delish.Author: Lauren Miyashiro

Delish.Name: S'mores Icebox Cake
Delish.Description: The marshmallow whipped cream is everything.
Delish.Author: Rian Handler

Delish.Name: Mexican Beef 'N Rice Skillet
Delish.Description: Cheesiness at its best.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Bruschetta Shrimp Pasta
Delish.Description: You're going to be making this satisfying shrimp pasta all summer long.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Pizza-Stuffed Chicken
Delish.Description: It's like eating pizza without the carbs.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Bruschetta Chicken Pasta
Delish.Description: World, meet your new favorite dinner.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Crispy Skillet Tortellini
Delish.Description: Cooking frozen tortellini like you would potstickers is a total game-changer.
Delish.Author: Lauren Miyashiro

Delish.Name: Cheesy Breakfast Pizza
Delish.Description: Introducing the real breakfast of champions.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Grilled Donut Ice Cream Sandwich
Delish.Description: This ain't your average ice cream sandwich.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Twix Dip
Delish.Description: What could be better than a molten candy bar?
Delish.Author: Candace Braun Davison

Delish.Name: Buffalo Chicken Taquitos
Delish.Description: If you love buffalo chicken, you'll freak out over these buffalo chicken taquitos. Feel free to swap flour tortillas for corn tortillas.
Delish.Author: Lauren Miyashiro

Delish.Name: Reese's Amazeballs
Delish.Description: These chocolate-peanut butter bites are amazeballs. (And they'll keep in the fridge for 3-4 days!)
Delish.Author: Candace Braun Davison

Delish.Name: Make-Ahead Bacon & Egg Sandwiches
Delish.Description: You'll never have to settle for a mediocre breakfast sandwich again!
Delish.Author: Lauren Miyashiro

Delish.Name: Garlicky Lemon Shrimp with Angel Hair
Delish.Description: If you love shrimp scampi, you need this in your life.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Prosciutto-Chicken Pasta
Delish.Description: Crispy morsels of prosciutto will make you forget all about bacon.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Chicken Gyros
Delish.Description: Optional, but highly encouraged: Add a few cooked French fries to the wrap, and/or crumbled Feta. You won't regret it.
Delish.Author: Candace Braun Davison

Delish.Name: Cauliflower Fried Rice
Delish.Description: Give us all of the veggies.
Delish.Author: Rian Handler

Delish.Name: Buffalo-Ranch Chicken Bowties
Delish.Description: Buffalo sauce livens up this creamy, cheesy sauce, creating an out-of-this-world, two-pan dinner.
Delish.Author: Candace Braun Davison

Delish.Name: Roasted Asparagus Carbonara
Delish.Description: What makes carbonara even better? Roasted asparagus.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Lemony Shrimp and Asparagus Spaghetti
Delish.Description: All the fresh flavors you crave in one super-easy spaghetti.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: The Works Skillet Pizza
Delish.Description: Everything you could want—veggies, sausage, and pepperoni—in one pie.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: BBQ Chicken Skillet Pizza
Delish.Description: Recreate the CPK fave with this insanely delicious homemade pie.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Primavera Skillet Pizza
Delish.Description: Easy and so cheesy.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Beef and Broccoli Stir-Fry
Delish.Description: With an unbelievably delicious sauce, this beef and broccoli rivals the best takeout.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Ginger Beef Stir-Fry with Ramen
Delish.Description: This stir-fry has a ginger-garlic kick that you won't be able to resist.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Cheesy Chicken Broccoli Bake
Delish.Description: This dish is like broccoli cheddar soup all grown up.
Delish.Author: Rian Handler

Delish.Name: Cookie Dough Frosting
Delish.Description: This next-level frosting is every cookie dough lover's dream.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Lemon Garlic Chicken
Delish.Description: This addictive yet simple dish is your new weeknight go-to.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Creamy Roasted Red Pepper Penne
Delish.Description: With a super-light cream sauce, this spinach and roasted red pepper penne is addictive.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Italian Spaghetti Squash
Delish.Description: Stuffed with crumbled Italian sausage and cheese (and a little tomato sauce—yes, taking another liberty here), you have yourself a beautiful mess of Italian ingredients.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Cheesy Italian Rice with Sausage
Delish.Description: Use up the rest of the Italian sausage, rice (so cheap!), cheese, and spinach for this killer cheesy rice.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Mexican Chicken Pasta
Delish.Description: It's a cheesy Tex-Mex dream.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Milky Way Hot Mess
Delish.Description: The ultimate shareable dessert for your next girls night.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Strawberry Cheesecake Bars
Delish.Description: The doctored cake mix crust tastes like a cross between a blondie and a strawberry cookie—and makes your whole house smell amazing.
Delish.Author: Candace Braun Davison

Delish.Name: Skillet Tuna Melt
Delish.Description: A deconstructed tuna melt = new favorite healthy dinner.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Spaghetti with Fried Egg and Crispy Pepperoni
Delish.Description: Easier than a carbonara, but with all the flavor.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Pizza Frittata
Delish.Description: If you love pizza everything (and who doesn't?!), you need to pizza-ify your frittata.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Cheesy Asparagus Pasta
Delish.Description: Fall in love with asparagus this spring with this amazingly creamy pasta.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Roasted Red Pepper Pesto Penne
Delish.Description: This deliciously savory red pesto will make you never want to go green again.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Turkey, Mozzarella, and Kale Pesto Panini
Delish.Description: An insanely delicious—and stuffed—panini recipe.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Chicken Fajita Quesadillas with Cilantro Pesto
Delish.Description: With the fixings of chicken fajitas, melty pepper jack, and zingy cilantro pesto, this heavenly quesadilla means biz.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Delish.Name: Cheesy Ground Beef Tacos
Delish.Description: You'll want to eat this filling with or without the tortilla.
Delish.Author: Lindsay Funston

Epicurious.Name: Pasta with Ramp Pesto and Guanciale
Epicurious.Description: Is it necessary to blanch, then shock, the ramp greens? If you want a super-green (not khaki) pesto, it is.
Epicurious.Author: Andy Baraghani

Epicurious.Name: Pasta with Baby Artichokes, Mascarpone, and Hazelnuts
Epicurious.Description: The hardest part of making this recipe is trimming the artichokes, which isn’t as hard as it seems. If you can’t get your hands on baby artichokes, use the hearts of two globe artichokes.
Epicurious.Author: Andy Baraghani

Epicurious.Name: Pappardelle with Chicken Ragù, Fennel, and Peas
Epicurious.Description: You’ll still get that velvety consistency from this lighter ragù, but this recipe won’t take you all day to make.
Epicurious.Author: Andy Baraghani

Epicurious.Name: Herb-Crusted Cauliflower Steaks with Beans and Tomatoes
Epicurious.Description: This cauliflower "steak" is so impressive, your meal will demand a steak knife! Prep work is simplified for this sheet-pan dinner with an herbed garlic oil that's used two ways: first it's mixed with panko and Parmesan for a crispy crust for the cauliflower, then tossed with beans and cherry tomatoes for a zesty side dish.
Epicurious.Author: Katherine Sacks

Epicurious.Name: Warm Chicken Salad with Asparagus and Creamy Dill Dressing
Epicurious.Description: To quickly revive dry, cold rotisserie chicken, place slices of it in a steamer basket along with spring vegetables for a seasonal warm salad—it's a whole new take on a one-pot dinner.
Epicurious.Author: Anna Stockwell

Epicurious.Name: Cheesy Chicken Enchilada Skillet
Epicurious.Description: This Mexican-inspired meal offers all the goodness of cheesy chicken enchiladas with half the effort.
Epicurious.Author: Anna Stockwell

Epicurious.Name: Sheet-Pan Pasta Bake with Chicken and Kale
Epicurious.Description: Quicker, easier, and with more crispy topping per bite than your standard pasta casserole.
Epicurious.Author: Anna Stockwell

Epicurious.Name: Easy Fried Rice with Chicken and Broccolini
Epicurious.Description: Fried rice is one of the fastest, easiest meals you can make, and a great way to use up leftovers. Our vegetable-packed version calls for freshly cooked broccolini, snow peas, edamame, and chicken, but feel free to substitute any quick-cooking or leftover vegetables and protein. The simple orange-soy sauce adds acidity, sweetness, and an umami punch.
Epicurious.Author: Rhoda Boone

Epicurious.Name: Easter Egg Cake with Strawberry Frosting
Epicurious.Description: White chocolate shavings form a "nest" for chocolate eggs on this pretty pink cake. Malted milk powder gives both the cake and the frosting a toasty flavor and creamy richness.
Epicurious.Author: Adrianna Adarme

Epicurious.Name: Classic Carrot-Coconut Cake
Epicurious.Description: Classic carrot-coconut cake is a Southern tradition. Ours has a healthy dose of ginger and cinnamon for a nice spice and cream cheese frosting sprinkled with pretty coconut flakes for a beautiful finishing touch.
Epicurious.Author: Katherine Sacks

Epicurious.Name: “Tzimmes” Chicken with Apricots, Prunes, and Carrots
Epicurious.Description: This holiday-ready dinner has all the flavors of tzimmes, the traditional Jewish sweet side dish made with stewed dried fruits and honey. Roasted on baking sheets with colorful young carrots, this recipe feeds a crowd with minimal effort, giving you plenty of time for stress-free hosting.
Epicurious.Author: Anna Stockwell

Epicurious.Name: Spanish Frittata with Herby Yogurt and Greens
Epicurious.Description: The potatoes are what make this the love child of a Spanish tortilla and an Italian frittata. But you don’t necessarily need them. Fill this frittata with 2 cups of whatever leftover cooked vegetables you have in your fridge and drop “Spanish” from the name. Serve with a crisp green salad.
Epicurious.Author: David Tamarkin

Epicurious.Name: Hungarian Golden Pull-Apart Cake with Walnuts and Apricot Jam (Aranygaluska)
Epicurious.Description:
Aranygaluska, also called golden dumpling cake, butter puffs, and monkey bread, has been extolled by Jewish immigrants from Hungary for years. I first noticed a recipe for the cake in George Lang’s The Cuisine of Hungary from 1971. Aranygaluska probably started as a rich cake, like the German Dampfnudeln (see my Jewish Cooking in America) served with fish or soup on Fridays, when no meat was allowed for Catholics. Jews who separated meat from dairy in their diet would serve it with a fish or non-meat soup.
Agnes Sanders, who grew up under Communism in Miskolc, Hungary, kindly showed me how she makes aranygaluska in her kitchen on New York’s Upper West Side. Agnes’s version of aranygaluska, learned in this country, was not as rich as I remembered it. I have tweaked her recipe here and there, adding ingredients like vanilla to the cake. I also add a chocolate alternative to the nuts, called kuchembuchem (one of those marvelous made-up Yiddish rhyming names), often made with leftover babka dough. Try one or both versions.
Epicurious.Author: Joan Nathan

Epicurious.Name: Salmon Gefilte Fish Mold with Horseradish and Beet Sauce
Epicurious.Description:
For centuries, Jewish women schlepped to the fish market, choosing the best fish “by the look in its eyes” before transforming it into the quintessential Sabbath gefilte fish. Using a wooden bowl and a half-moon-shaped chopper, they cut up the fish with onions, crying a little, chopping a little, until the mix was just the right consistency, later to be shaped into ovals or balls and poached in fish broth.
Today, cooks often turn to commercially prepared frozen loaves of ground fish, sometimes even spiked with jalapeños or almonds and raisins. These new, more American flavors are rapidly replacing the more distinctively fishy blends made from carp, whitefish, and pike, and have a smooth texture that indicates they have never felt the blade of a hand chopper.
Although gefilte innovation like the first jarred fish and the frozen loaves are taking over now, I still, as with many things, prefer the taste of homemade that I make twice a year for Passover and Rosh Hashanah. Before Passover, at what we call a “gefilte-in,” friends assemble in my kitchen with their own pots, fish, carrots, eggs, and matzo meal to make these old-fashioned fish patties. For Rosh Hashanah, I make a light, circular fish terrine that looks beautiful and has the components of gefilte fish, but is much easier to make, baked in a Bundt or tube pan in a bain-marie. This is also a great make-ahead recipe, as it requires several hours of refrigeration before serving.
Turned out onto a platter and featured as one of many foods at a buffet, it is always a big success. Even those who swear they would never eat gefilte fish come back for seconds, provided you serve horseradish sauce with it.
Epicurious.Author: Joan Nathan

Epicurious.Name: Horseradish and Beet Sauce
Epicurious.Description:
Jews serve horseradish, sliced as a root or ground into a sauce, at Passover to symbolize the bitterness of slavery. It was in Ashkenaz, what is now Alsace-Lorraine and southern Germany, that the horseradish root replaced the romaine and arugula of more southerly climates as the bitter herbs at the Passover dinner.
Today, farmers in France dig up horseradish roots and peel and grate them outdoors, making sure to protect their eyes from the sting. Then they mix the root with a little sugar and vinegar and sometimes grated beets, keeping it for their own personal use or selling it at local farmers' markets.
Horseradish with beets originally came from farther east in Poland, to which Jews immigrated from the west in the fourteenth century, and from the east probably earlier. It was a condiment served at Easter and represented the blood of Jesus Christ, something that I will bet most Jews did not know when they bought it from farmers at outside markets in Poland.
A few years ago, I ate an adaptation of this tasty sauce at the short-lived Kutsher’s Restaurant in New York. I have played with it and now it is a keeper at our Passover Seder.
Epicurious.Author: Joan Nathan

Epicurious.Name: Spiced Moroccan Vegetable Soup with Chickpeas, Cilantro, and Lemon (Harira)
Epicurious.Description: This is by far my favorite comfort soup. Until I met Meme Suissa, who comes from Casablanca, I had been making a different version. But I swooned after trying her recipe, enhanced with an egg-lemon sauce, that she may have learned from a Turkish forebear. She has been making this for almost eighty years, first watching her mother, then cooking for her five children after she immigrated, like many Moroccan Jews, to French-speaking Montreal.
Epicurious.Author: Joan Nathan

Epicurious.Name: Mango-Chutney Chicken with Roasted Carrots And Zucchini
Epicurious.Description: The whole family gets what they want with this easy, customizable sheet-pan dinner that offers three different levels of flavor-building seasoning. Feel free to mix and match options 1-3 on each plate to make everyone happy.
Epicurious.Author: Rhoda Boone

Epicurious.Name: Asian Vegetable Noodle Toss
Epicurious.Description: This simple pasta uses gluten-free buckwheat noodles to complement blanched veggies and an Asian-inspired sauce for an easy weeknight dinner.
Epicurious.Author: Dr. John McDougall
